title: #375 – The ketogenic diet, ketosis, and hyperbaric oxygen: metabolic therapies for weight loss, cognitive enhancement, cancer, Alzheimer’s disease, brain injuries, and more Dominic D’Agostino, Ph.D.
summary: “If you elevate β-hydroxybutyrate in the blood 1 mM, that represents a 10% increase of available energy to the brain.” —Dom D’Agostino The post #375 – The ketogenic diet, ketosis, and hyperbaric oxygen: metabolic therapies for weight loss, cognitive enhancement, cancer, Alzheimer’s disease, brain injuries, and more | Dominic D’Agostino, Ph.D. appeared first on Peter Attia.
